Text:
It's the real thing. Thanks Klimt_Westwood. 

Btw: the text doesn't look clear on my computer, any suggestions?

It seems like a good quality guide. I used Adobe Reader 9.4 (free from Adobe) to quickly glance it over. I wouldn't use it to read the guide though. It's roughly 250 pages, so maybe a quick run to a printing shop would help. There are pictures, so I would recommend printing in color. Enjoy!
is this legit? i'm currently downloading one which has 278mb...
Legit?? Legit means you spent money on to own it.
Next time don't reduce the size so much. It severely degraded the quality. Makes it hard on the eyes. Cheers.

This is not my scan. I'm just passing on what I found on some forum (and it is 240 megs unrared). The quality isn't great but it's quite legible when blown to more than 150% and I found it looks *much* clearer in Foxit (a free PDF reader) than in Adobe. The difference might help some people. Thanks for seeding!
Does anyone have the game manual? I would like to do my reading in order.
lol i stole my guide from gamestop :]

@Klimt_Westwood 

you can download the manual from steam web site.

It never even occured to me to download the manual from Steam. Thanks! Now a bit of light reading while waiting for the update... let's say no. 6... which will require starting a new game... and I can start to play properly prepared. :)
Coolest...bless u!

What great quality seeders! 1.7 MB/s, finished 53 seconds :D.  Great guide!

Just one complaint, you need to view it at 125% to be able to read it, but no problem.  Thanks!

yes open it with Foxit.
Acrobat 9 freezes while navigating this file in my computer. But using Foxit the document looks better and there's no no freezing.
OMG! 57 SEEDS 1 PEER EPIC!!!!
OMG! 55 SEEDS / 2 PEERS EPIC!! Good Job ! Thanks for uploading :)
Klimt_Westwood - thanks for the recommendation about using the foxit reader, it has a waaaay better quality than adobe at least when reading this guide
Foxit does view this much clearer.  Except neither foxit or Adobe allow me to interact with it.  I can't click on menu's to skip around the document. WTF?
im having trouble getting the file after download completes, have rar and multiple pdf programs but its not picking up anything, any tips

Or you can go and download 5 times smaller size and about 5 times clearer primaguide at: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5932741/Fallout_New_Vegas_Official_PDF_eGuide_-iNFERNO

40 odd megabytes a lot clearer than this copy and besides the menu works as it should.
Thank you so much mate, I pre-ordered that shit (it's not in stores yet in my country) and now I can get it for free :)

I used to download these pdfs but seeing as I get the games for free, i might as well buy the guides at the very least.  Also, having a hard copy is 10 million times better than these pdfs.  Easier to read and easier to navigate through....not to mention the shiny pages and pictures :P
Bought the game but saved a good money here. Thanks for the torrent!
there's a better quality guide out there that is much easier to navigate and open (no freezing)

That upload is a real cat babe, youre the high-roller (lawl)

Nice one, thanks.
